# Verify that we don't receive any diagnostics when there
# are no files in the package

[short] skip 'Skip because we sleep for GOVIM_ERRLOGMATCH_WAIT to verify we haven''t received diagnostics'

sleep $GOVIM_ERRLOGMATCH_WAIT
errlogmatch -count=0 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams'

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

go 1.12
